Negative_Review: Room was too small for the price thank God I booked the terrace otherwise you keep bumping into each other
Positive_Review: Excellent location very close to the Metro Friendly staff clean
Great stay Comfortable clean and well situated it was our first time visiting Barcelona the hotel is an easy walk to the things you want to do Would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: Reception staff can only understand English when they want to If you go with a problem they decide they don t understand you The man on reception is extremely rude and seems to dislike women The staff put you off right away I wouldn t recommend this hotel to anyone
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: The terrace room was not great Too cramped for 2 pax and no privacy with a toilet with a glass door Terrace a bit of a waste
Positive_Review: Location was amazing staff were friendly

Negative_Review: When we first arrived to the hotel by car I hurried to the reception to get the directions to the parking while my husband was waiting for me in the car They handed me a paper with a map drawn on it and on which the names of streets were barely showing The lady who was at the reception asked me to wait until her colleagues finishes with the clients so that he can explain to me how to get there since it was my first time in Barcelona When I asked the guy for further directions he laughed sarcastically and said just follow the map as if I was stupid to ask him this question I think he was the manager for that evening When we wanted to check in and they couldnt find Lebanon on their system the lady helping me asked him so he also sarcastically commented in italian and started laughing The next day we needed more towels so I called the reception and the same guy answered saying he doesnt have anyone to bring us towels but if need be he can give us a towel if we come to reception which I find to be a little bit unprofessional I mean he could have at least asked a colleague but anyway I was not impressed at all with the staff however the bed was comfy
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy that s all

Negative_Review: The hotel has some small signs of wear and tear Water pipe in our room was leaking a bit but was fixed in 1 day We were staying on the top floor so there were some signs of moisture caused damage on the ceiling All that said I recommed this place
Positive_Review: I think the location was superb in Barcelona Between Pla a de Catalunya and Pla a d Espanya Great and very tasty breakfast Very nice staff

Negative_Review: Their snack menu was limited in time choices Small pool
Positive_Review: Around a 10 min walk to La Rambla a fantastic place to walk around Very clean Room is very big and spacious Friendly staff and reception Has a free to use business center computers a printer

Negative_Review: The bar was inefficient with only one person covering room service and Bar Breakfast was overpriced at 17 euros per person the breakfast in a cafe a short walk away was 6 euro s per person
Positive_Review: The Beds were comfortable shower room smelled of drains generally clean staff were pleasant but inexperienced didn t know the name of the restaurant next door and were not exceedingly helpful

Negative_Review: Lifts remain out of order most of th time and only one was working
Positive_Review: Staff was pleasant and friendly location was verygood and excess to shopping area metro bus was easy hotel was neat and clean

Negative_Review: Perhaps the lift frequency in the mornings when the maids were swinging into action
Positive_Review: Have stayed in 5 star hotels worldwide and also in Barcelona This little gem came as a complete surprise The staff looked as if they were enjoying every moment of their work Politness smiles and great service The hotel have found the key to great customer pleasure and satisfaction Compliments Can t wait to stay there again in the future

Negative_Review: The buffet breakfast had a good variety of options However the restaurant staff couldn t make my eggs as I liked even after several attempts by the chef I requested my fried eggs to be well done but even after 3 attempts they were still very burnt and runny in the middle
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful Hotel was very clean throughout Beach is bit far to walk but is roughly 5 mins in taxi

The staff were extremely lovely the room and the bathroom was so clean the air conditioning was just what we needed after a long hot day The pool and outside area was really nice annnnnd as a lover of sushi they partnered with a sushi takeaway as a to service Will definitely come back and recommend

Negative_Review: I noticed that payment was taken from my account upon booking I believe this is for verification purposes and the payment was then refunded a lower amount due to exchange rates This effectively causes the bank to apply fees for non a non UK transaction Upon final payment another set of fees are applicable for another non UK transaction I have not come across this before but certainly something this is not desirable
Positive_Review: Location is excellent and within 50 steps of the Urgell Metro station and 10 15 min walk to Las Ramblas This is a straightforward and un complicated Hotel ideal for business trips Facilities are adequate breakfast was up to standards and really affordable

Negative_Review: Pool is a bit too small for my taste It s more like a exercise pool or jacuzzi Buildings surrounding the pool area are not pleasant to look at
Positive_Review: Location and friendly staff
Great location excellent quality interior very friendly staff super comfortable bed Id book at this hotel every time i go to barcelona

Negative_Review: They were doing work to a wall in the corridor opposite our room at the time of the stay so it was a bit of a tight squeeze It was no problem though
Positive_Review: The buffet breakfast each morning was well worth the extra Location was great near to 2 Metro stops and staff were super friendly

Negative_Review: I felt the room s bathroom window was not covered enough felt a bit exposed When I went to the guest s kitchen it was a bit disorganized
Positive_Review: I liked the price the staff 24 7 reception desk availability toiletries and towels included well functioning air conditioner and tv availability of yoga classes on certain days

Negative_Review: The bathroom condition is not that good The towel rack got a bit rust and the size was too small It was also inconvenient that the bathroom and the toilet were separated into 2 spaces by wall
Positive_Review: Every staff was really nice and kind with happy smile English fluency was really good Some of staffs gave us map with explanation about the neighborhood There were welcoming drinks but we didn t take them Room cleaning service is good as well

Very nicely located not to far away from the busy areas but just enough to get a good nights sleep Rooms were cleaned every day and the reception staff were very helpful with any questions about the city

Negative_Review: I arrived really needing wifi and both check in and wifi were down for the entire 24 hours I was later compensated by the Management but it was a real downer and I wasted a lot of time trying to find a wifi location The reception simply said nothing we can do It s down instead of trying to link up with a next door cafe in what could have been a win win situation Not a good idea to try to replicate Vueling plane decor in a hotel Grey and yellow for a bedroom I think not
Positive_Review: Hotel was willing to accept a package that arrived by courrier before my arrival and I am grateful Bed and shower were good Close to the Aerobus stop a block away Great pastry shop next door

Negative_Review: Tiny pool short staffed at night and the bathroom area doesn t offer much privacy As is common now the bathroom area is an open space with the toilet and shower closed off excellent shower with rain and normal shower heads
Positive_Review: As hotel prices in BCN have skyrocketed for the summer this hotel is good value especially for the location We had a twin room which was quite roomy for 2 twin beds a desk 2 chairs a huge walk in shower and even a little balcony all great The pool was VERY tiny and a bit disappointing but with the beach not far it was acceptable The location is perfect walking distance to all my top neighbourhoods I m a frequent visitor Ramblas Eixample El Born and even not that long a walk to the beach if you re inclined to take the scenic route about 45 minutes Many many restaurants and bars very near by to fit all budgets The staff was friendly and helpful although some of the hotel policies seem to cut corners perhaps emblematic of Vueling itself no bell staff from about 9pm to 9am so if you need anything like towels or an iron you have to go fetch it We didn t try the restaurant or bar with so many fantastic places in BCN to check out

Negative_Review: There was only one sink outside the toilet shower area for washing hands the same sink was used for making tea washing glasses etc which we didn t think was appropriate
Positive_Review: The hotel is very modern bright We slept in a front room noise was very minimal maybe just morning traffic The hotel itself was very quiet no banging doors noise from lifts etc allowing for a good nights sleep The staff were really lovely helpful if you needed advice on anything at all
Location close to major city attractions and the hotel is a modern clean hotel with good wifi and a wonderful shower Good breakfast till 11 00AM during the week and 11 30AM during the weekend

Negative_Review: Just would have loved access to a jug for tea coffee but the area has lots of cafes which means that you don t have to travel far for breakfast
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful Fair sized room for the price Conveniently located near a metro stop for using public transport The air transport theme was neat

Negative_Review: All good really but the room furniture is getting to feel a bit used
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful we were allowed to rest in the pool area although we had checked out much earlier taxis very efficiently booked for me breakfast excellent hotel quiet and well located and we loved our private terrace

Negative_Review: Possibly a little less expensive per night or inclusive of breakfast
Positive_Review: Quirky with comfort staff very helpful and friendly We are a mature couple so comfort and cleanliness is high on our agenda

The Vueling Bcn by HC is a wonderful boutique hotel situated a 10 12 minute walk from the city center Placa Catalunya the staff is super super friendly the rooms are extremely clean and pampering great shower comfortable beds mini bar 40inch flat screen TV there are coffee shops and bars all around and the neighboohood is yound and lively we had a great time

Negative_Review: The bathroom could have been a bit cleaner
Positive_Review: Complimentary drink to be had at the bar comfortable bed the rain shower was perfect simple yet modern room decor the wi fi was great I would stay here again

Negative_Review: While nice and helpful the front desk staff were not especially friendly We are from southern USA We like to be treated as home folks
Positive_Review: Good restaurant Nice staff there Good housekeeping staff Modern and sleek facility Front desk staff were nice and helpful

Negative_Review: If you store your room key close to cell phone it doesn t work anymore and you have to reset it at reception One night the internet was not working late in the evening till next morning Normally internet works fine and easy acces with simple wifi code
Positive_Review: Nice hotel very friendly staff Helpful and flexible Especially liked the bed large enough soft and the perfect shower

Negative_Review: Pricey hotel for size but in centre of Barcelona and the week of Barcelona Open Tennis
Positive_Review: Good location near Metro near cafes restaurants 24 hr parking nearby a clever concept hotel inside of aircraft A small hotel but has everything we needed Good toiletries in the bathroom Great shower Lovely fruit platter on our return to our room on second day

Negative_Review: I liked it all If people are looking for party atmosphere this hotel does not have it Too many places to party in Barcelona Staying at Vueling was perfect because it s so quiet
Positive_Review: Bed was awesome Total silence in the room Clean to the max Excellent distribution of space in the room Great view from the room Excellent location Calm and serene hotel Staff is super nice and helpful

Negative_Review: that triple rooms have no view to the street only to the patio
Positive_Review: the staff the bell boy at check in was fantastic helpful friendly going the extra mile

Negative_Review: Had to pay 17 00 for breakfast It should be included or at a lower price
Positive_Review: The place was in a great location few steps from the center of town and the bus stop from the airport

Negative_Review: Rooms could have been a bit larger We are gym people so more variety for resistance training equipment would have been nice
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful The hotel decor and concept was Cute and put a smile on our faces Our room was very comfortable yet compact and efficient

Negative_Review: A pick pocket stole lots of money from my partners deep front jean pocket when on the street in Barcelona This was obviously no fault of the Hotel but a warning for everyone not to carry much money on you and only in inside pockets
Positive_Review: Everything seemed new and modern decor inside Staff were great especially the bell boy Wonderful shower and extremely comfortable bed No noise from Street Many cafe s and restaurants close by with amazing food Easy to walk to lots of tourist spots including La Sagrada Familia and La Rambla Taxi s buses and Metro a few steps out front door Great value for money

Negative_Review: There was no kettle in the room to drink tea or coffee Was charged from the mini bar in the room which we wasn t aware of
Positive_Review: The hotel and room was very clean and modern deserves a 5 rating The room was cleaned and bed sheets where changed every day We had breakfast twice and there was a wide choice to pick from The staff are we re very kind and helpful The location is just perfect walking distance to metro and attractions couple minutes away by car Feels like being in a 5 star hotel Definantly recommend

Really stylish property excellent location 2nd stop on Airport shuttle and right next to Metro station Clean comfortable lovely big quiet rooms and great breakfast with excellent choice Would definitely go back

The Hotel Vueling Bcn by HC was well placed for the University of Barcelona The hotel catered for all my needs and even had some outside space with a small swimming pool with some seating Breakfast was excellent In general the hotel team were efficient courteous accommodating and provided excellent customer service The left luggage service was greatly appreciated

Negative_Review: the room was not clean at all the staff team could not guarantee the late check out until the moment of checking out so complicated to make any plan
Positive_Review: the situation

Negative_Review: I know from the last time that the breakfast is very good but it is a bit overpriced if you d ask me There are plenty of places where you could eat for cheaper If you don t like to search for breakfast then I d say to go for it
Positive_Review: The room has all you need Comfy bed I have back problems so a good bed is more than welcome Nice rain shower a hairdryer clean towels Good airco heating Walkable distance to good areas and close to a metro station I ve stayed at this hotel before and decided to go back here as it s a good hotel with friendly staff

Negative_Review: Toilets have no door latches Considering the Asian visitors they have to add it Breakfast is boring
Positive_Review: Excellent location Close to metro and Barcelona main rail station Friendly staff

Negative_Review: The tiolet has no water pipe
Positive_Review: I liked everything from the friendly staff to the location and cleaness rich and freash breakfast daily room preparation and comfort bed

The bed was very comfortable We were staying in the room 202 and the housekeeping lady did a very good job the room was always very clean and tidy When we left the boy on the reception asked if we would like to keep our luggage there since our flight was only at 19h so we could go for a walk

Negative_Review: The breakfast in the hotel is expensive and they dont replace the empty tissu box
Positive_Review: Everything was excellent the room very comfortable and the hotel quite and clean The staff very kind and speak english

The property was very clean and the rooms was really nice but mostly the staff was really friendly they was more friendly then any other hotel I ve stayed in so thank you to them I would defiantly stay their again great location and easy to get to city center from that

Comfortable room amazing decoration great location delicious bakery and restaurant next door 24 hour shops very close to the hotel easy access to go to and from the airport with Aerobus very friendly and helpful staff

The location of the hotel was amazing it located right next to a train station which allowed me and my mum to travel around Barcelona as well as being within walking distance to the town centre where the shops and bus tours start from The staff at the hotel were also nice and very helpful

Negative_Review: The shower was sometimes cold in the morning possibly they had solar panels
Positive_Review: Bed was so comfy great location lovely staff we were room only wee bit expensive we thought 800 that was for 7 days arriving on the 26 th December

Negative_Review: They didn t prepared the third bed of my room which I have payed and booked I had to do it by my self The bathroom is small and a lot of things were not working
Positive_Review: Perfect location in the heart of bcn
Compact and efficient hotel had exactly what I needed and nothing I did Not need Great young staff Location perfect Clean I will be back

Negative_Review: exteremely rude they called a police on us My debit card was stuck in bank machine i had no money i paid what ever cash i had for one night of stay then they charge me triple rate amount on my credit card without my authorization when i complained they called the police on me
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Water were escaping out to the room hall when opening the shower room door so I had to put a towel to sponge all water While I was there the sofa at the lobby was broken I wasn t aware of that and got a little hurt when I sat on it Besides that all was good
Positive_Review: comfy room good central location tasty breakfast great shower room friendly staff

Negative_Review: Room had no cattle and breakfast is expensive
Positive_Review: Hotel location and WiFi were extra Staff is very good and were Co operated and nice attitude with the welcome drink

Negative_Review: Disappointed with breakfast eggs that should have been hot were cold
Positive_Review: Although busy road was directly outside room no traffic noise at all Blackout curtains ensured good night s sleep Room directly next to elevator yet never heard anyone outside

Negative_Review: Awful staff welcomed us with a rude attitude and wasn t kind also prices for everything are extremely high including what you get for your price
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The weather Nothing the hotel staff could do about that unfortunstely
Positive_Review: The room looked super modern Separate toilet wash basin and shower was fantastic Saved a lot of time The staff were extremely friendly Everyone spoke perfect english which was very helpful The facilities were great pool and gym were great and the bar and restaurant were surprisingly reasonably priced The room service and massage service offered were great although we didnt make use of them on this ocassion The location was excellent a short walk away from anything you needed

Negative_Review: We had a small triple room with no view at all all triple rooms have no view and are facing a tiny light well providing very little daylight
Positive_Review: Very convenient location close to subway

Negative_Review: To become better than the best
Positive_Review: The breakfast is much better than the local restaurant The location is amazing for the trip by plane for the stop of round trip between here and airport The seperation of bathroom and toilet is perfect The networks is good They also have a gym

The best hotel i ve been The staff is friendly and kind the breakfast is rich and the rooms are supper clean It suits everyone couples children atc The location it great close enough to center of Barcelona and quite The hotel design is cool and new The price is pretty low Highly recommended

Negative_Review: Larger pool would be nice it s tiny but nice for kids
Positive_Review: Very good location helpful staff easy access as the airport bus stops only 100 m away from the Hotel Very good room 205 with small but nice balcony
Location was perfect to move around Barcelona Hotel very comfortable and super clean the restaurant provided good quality food and cheap plus 10 discount

Negative_Review: In common with most hotels towel are changed even though they were hung up to be reused per notice
Positive_Review: Helpful staff Fairly central Just minutes from city centre metro stop and airport shuttle bus stop Liked separate WC from shower

Negative_Review: The bar could have stop open longer for residents but lots of other local bars within walking distance
Positive_Review: I thought it was quirky and the location was great

Negative_Review: Very small swimming pool for the capacity of the hotel
Positive_Review: Different style of comfortable furniture Good looking and average quiet hotel Very good location

I stayed a street side room with terrace it was comfortable and with nice view Shower strong some kinds of glasses in the room nice bed space with many cushions etc I d like stay again Breakfast was 10euros as promotion I was satisfied so much It was good in particular that they had tasty small sandwiches high quality sobrassada and many sausages cava But if it was 16euros I d feel it expensive Breakfast place and bar space were interesting like a airplane Worth seeing

Negative_Review: Language was a bit of a barrier with the staff especially housekeeping but nothing to put me off going back
Positive_Review: Loved the location In between two metro stops and within walking distance to Plaza Catalunya The rooms are very contemporary Kinda small but comfortable The welcome drinks are a nice touch

Negative_Review: pool was small but refreshing a bit of a walk to the sites but convenient public transit
Positive_Review: staff was great when I wanted to sleep in I was not disturbed but a note was left outside my door so that in the PM I could call for my room to be tended to Very convenient to the airport bus public transit
The TEAM the location the breakfast the room Everything was perfect Will the reception guy is amazing This is my hotel from now on in Barcelona

Negative_Review: Probably just a tiny bit over price Junior suit is located on the ground floor which is a blessing with kids but didn t had any views
Positive_Review: Friendly staff Excellent breakfast Located centrally yet not noisy at all

Negative_Review: Very small rooms the lavotory is in the same space with the bed in a table next to the tv It looks like a budget hotel but it is not cheap
Positive_Review: Very clean modern excellent location

Negative_Review: Swimming pool is very small and overlooked from every angle
Positive_Review: The property is central so easy to access many of the popular tourist destinations The gym was an added bonus small but it has enough for a really good workout Metro literally outside

Negative_Review: Staff can do better in every aspect especially knowledge info about Barcelona
Positive_Review: location is awesome Convenient to every resort but quiet hidden in gran via 1 2 min to metro station urgell

Negative_Review: The first room we had was for three people The room was so small there was no space for putting our things or moving around Getting ready was also a challenge We requested a larger room and was given one the next day This room was larger and better for 3 people
Positive_Review: The breakfast was outstanding Great coffee

Negative_Review: Breakfast area maybe too small I would make bathroom as one area in the rooms Not nice to see sink when you walk into the rooms
Positive_Review: Great position Large rooms

Negative_Review: The pool size pictures on the web are misleading I do not consider that to be a pool Important to know that it is a very small pool The television connection was bad for some channels like Disney It was not working or breaking up Toilet paper was not refilled after first cleaning visit The lack of light in the family suite The window was more like a light opening except no light came in So it felt like a basement room
Positive_Review: The location is really good and the breakfast was delicious with some Spanish specialties like the fuet the cheese and grilled vegetables was great The room size for family was very good Kids didn t complain about the sofa bed

Negative_Review: Room was small Noise proofing from adjacent rooms was poor Also my room was next to the lifts which made a maddening noise
Positive_Review: Good location very near a metro station and within walking distance of Placa Catalunya Pool gym Excellent breakfast My room has a nice large terrace

Negative_Review: Room too small for three adults and stayed for three nights the first day morning at 6 o clock dog barking to woke us up second day morning 3 o clock faulty fire alarm to woke us up third day morning the dog barking again at 5 am Can t open the curtains or windows as facing local people s living room Too hot in the room but can t turn on the air con as no duvet and as soon as you turn on the air con is too cold in the room Worst 4 stars hotel we ever stayed won t stay here again
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: I suggest carpeting the hallways Pergo floors are good but are not the best sound absorption materials for a hotel facility
Positive_Review: This is one of the most friendly stuff I have experienced in many years of traveling Excellent customer care and professionalism Great convinient location

Negative_Review: At the front desk you can find great staff like the young lady that checked me in and staff that doesn t even recognize you as a client they could probably use more communication as well there isn t many info about the hotel s services like the pool restaurant bar or gym in the rooms you can t find that info either As the hotel was having some maintenance done there were some awkward moments like the fire alarm shooting at 7am and having to wait to get inside the hotel because they were fixing the front door in the middle of the day However this are details The overall experience was great and I would definetely go back
Positive_Review: Great location and welcoming The rooms look amazing and are truly comfortable The housekeeping service was great

Negative_Review: No queen or king bed two single beds were joined together with rollers so they kept coming apart in the middle of the night
Positive_Review: Clean place and tidy room fresh towels etc Good location

Negative_Review: Lobby and lounge area decor too kitschy and cold for my liking On a busy street also so lacks neighborhood character
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for a two day stay in Barcelona Easy in on the airport shuttle and easy out Adjacent to Raval and all the sites Staff were helpful and nice Beds comfortable and room quiet

Negative_Review: The size of the suite they say during the reservation that the suite is 25 square meters while it is 15 You can hear anyone walks by your door there is no sound isolation Their breakfast is the same every day
Positive_Review: The only thing that I liked was the staff they were great and helpful

Negative_Review: A little more privacy between the room and bathroom facility s
Positive_Review: The friendliness and helpfulness of the staff was excellent The buffet breakfast was good and the couple of main meals we had were very good Free WIFI was a bonus
Great location urgell station just a few steps away and taxis driving past constantly Could easily walk to Las Rambla and place espa a

The staff were extremely friendly and helpful The location was excellent 10 min walk to Catalunya and 10 min to Espanya and 50m to Metro Urgell The room was spotless and the shower great good pressure and nice and hot Good to have a safe too

Negative_Review: Breakfast quite expensive but for first morning was good to take it there allowing us to go out for the day
Positive_Review: Location was fabulous Staff very helpful and pleasant Rooms were so clean and everything was excellent Felt safe in this area Lots of lovely cafes nearby for breakfast alternatives

Negative_Review: We stayed in a suite with private pool the only downside to our stay was that the pool wasn t heated It was very cold This may not be the case when the weather I warmer
Positive_Review: Good selection at breakfast Good location Spacious rooms staff very friendly

Negative_Review: Tea making facilities in room Certainly not a deal breaker though
Positive_Review: Modern but simple and stylish Friendly staff Great location close to tourist areas but not right in it so nice and quiet

Negative_Review: there is no cupboard so you have to hang your clothes near the wash bowl which is located in the corridor and clothes are not partitioned from it The bag places under the hangers so you splash water over clothes and luggage both toilet room and shower cubicle have glass doors which don t close firmly there is no toilet brush
Positive_Review: rooms are clean they were cleaned up every day towels were changed regular charwoman added soap shower gel and napkins there is good wc pan and wash bowl shower cubicle is handy beds and pillows are comfortable there is a big TV set good lighting air conditioner was not very noisy there is underground station and station of the bus which goes to the airport nearby

Negative_Review: the breakfast could be better it was cold and not the best quality
Positive_Review: the bedding were one of the more comfortable i ve had from a 4 star hotel the cleanliness was on point

Negative_Review: The basin counter had big holes and they had this huge weighing machine So guest complained about the excess yellow which is the color of the airline the hotels after but nothing major dislikes
Positive_Review: Breakfast Breakfast room Room Shower Location I have stayed in other boutique hotels in Barcelona but this one is the best so far My bag was stolen having the computer with printer helped me alot in printing my id copies and forms So for that I felt very grateful
Loved the theme location photo on The wall Great design and attention to detail Loved The washbags Awesome shower Comfy bed Dog friendly Perfect location
close to the center good sized room helpful staff quiet eventhough on the main street but that could be due to the fact that my room was facing the oposite side on the way to the airport line

Negative_Review: The door of the toilett is made of glass and doesn t close completely That s something you must deal with
Positive_Review: The main road in front of the street is really noisy but the windows shut very well so with clodes windows noise is not a problem

Negative_Review: The breakfast was expensive EUR 16 Even in our staying there a buffet style breakfast was offered to us for only EUR 10 each but still it is expensive compared with the many options you can find in Barcelona for take a breakfast
Positive_Review: It was a nice hotel comfortable and well located in the center of Barcelona staff was kind

Negative_Review: nothing really apart from the bar area was maybe slightly small
Positive_Review: the hotel was very quiet in the morning whereas in other hotels it can be quite noisey with cleaning staff and people going for breakfast

Hotel is in great location for all that Barcelona has to offer close to Metro stations and an easy stroll from the very centre of town Airport bus stops virtually outside I stayed in a very comfortable if small room with a lovely terrace on the 8th floor Great sound proofing premium tv channels strong wi fi and a special mention for the house keeping cleaning which was excellent throughout my stay Thank you and well done

Good location for those travelling to Barcelona to enjoy the sights The room was small and had no view but it was modern clean and considering very good service and reasonable price made it a good choice
The hotel was ideally situated for us staff were really pleasant and helpful hotel was very clean and relaxing would recommend to my friends and family

Negative_Review: The bathroom sink out of the bathroom itself
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was very close to plaza catalunya the hotel was very clean and it s staff members were great Thanks for a wonderful stay

Negative_Review: Some rooms do not have much natural light especially if located on the inside of the hotel
Positive_Review: Staff are very helpful facilities are very good i will be using this hotel in all my future stays in Barcelona

Negative_Review: Lounge space was limited and when sitting one evening the table we were at was very dirty It was cleansed when we raised the point
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: No bad experience at all but would suggest they put facial tissue in the room and open the hotel restaurant on Sundays if possible
Positive_Review: The staff were helpful and pleasant Raul Martinez at the front desk stood out Upon check in he explained to us everything we had to know about the hotel and gave us information and tips on how to enjoy Barcelona Of all the hotels we stayed during our trips We have never met anyone as efficient and patient as Raul

Negative_Review: Our room for three was just a bit small And our windows were opening on a closed internal patio so daylight was scarce But nothing major
Positive_Review: Good location not far from Catalunya Square Room nicely decorated with great bedding and very quiet Very nice staff Small terrace with a cute dipping pool to enjoy the sun

Negative_Review: Hotel is narrow so reception area tad cramped the cafe area looked a bit naff but overall a very good spot to explore the city
Positive_Review: Location is ideal for exploring the city it is less than 50m from Urgell metro Breakfast very decent modern interior good proportions in room best shower at any hotel as good as home Staff efficient and friendly enough It is advisable to check whether you hv natural light as hotel is attached to other buildings we fortunately had an albeit shabby view unimportant at back of hotel
The location was excellent very close to Universitat Metro station to Catalonia plaza and to La Rampla street The room was very very clean and pretty and the staff were very nice and helpful

Great breakfast Anything you want from fried eggs to a cappuccino The staff were all extremely courteous and helpful Most everyone spoke English Very clean rooms We had a very pleasant stay and would stay again if we ever came back to Barcelona Thank you for your service Raul and Raquel

Negative_Review: The bed was quite hard which apparently isn t uncommon in Spain I liked that there was a gym on site although it was small
Positive_Review: The location was great within walking distance to the main areas and right above Escriba the best pastries chocolates They did a great job cleaning the room every day also

The staff was excellent and very personable Marta Andrea Raoul and another young lady at the desk I m so sorry I can t recall her name right now but she was excellent I m bad with names but everyone there should be commended for their service and friendliness

Negative_Review: The room is a little bit small The gym is not realy a gym very small and got almost nothing inside The pool is extreamly small
Positive_Review: The location is great The crew is amazing answer for every question with a smile and also the room service Great value for price

The staff are so friendly and provdide exceptional customer service No question or query is too big They even post your mail The location is superb as there is a smorgasbord of tapas resturants in walking distance

Negative_Review: Unfortunately we left som bread in the open So we had a little visitor during the night but the bottom of my shoe fixed him I heard that the building was for many years occupied by squatters completely blown out when renovated and it has been an extremely long and hot summer Wife not too pleased though
Positive_Review: Very new and modern hotel Being in a very expensive city every m2 is accounted or however we got an upgrade due to the fact that we payed about 920 euros parking and taxes include for 3 nights being a little rusty on booking com my own bl d y fault We did get an upgrade to a great room though on the intiative of the hotel staff spacious for Barcelona and with great beds We had requested a room towards the very busy Gran Via street on the third floor and with the doors to the small balcony closed it was completely silent Good and silent but complicated A C Parking in a nice garage with securitypersonell located in the same block 20 euros 24 hours The pool area is towards the back on the ground floor Small but clean and overall nice pool area with sunbeds and towels open till 21 Small but adequate bike crosstrainer walkingband and some weights gym in the basement Everything but the room was very cramped like in a plan but nice Nice soft flooring without the regular dirty walltowall carpeting Professional und not unfriendly staff I remember the catalans in general being quite rude but this time I was overall pleasantly surprised Buses 50 straight to Camp Nou and metro right outside To your left there is a very nice but very busy bakery cum caf called Escriba We opted for another one go right and next crossing over Gran Via it s called 555 2 women owns runs it opened 9 months ago Excellent coffe bread etc Great and fast sevice Avoid the bar restaurant called Guito across the Gran Via from the hotel It has blue signs and awful awful service After waiting 10 min for the menu the waiter when asked about somehing on the menu said How should I know I am not a chef We upped and left I would say if you can get this hotel for 125 150 euros a night incl taxes its a bargain

Negative_Review: Housekeeping forgot to replace the tea and coffee a couple times and the shampoo So what
Positive_Review: All the Staff was awesome with great dinner recommendations A special shout out to Xavier Raul and Marc

Rooms are modern clean comfortable and beautifully designed Wifi is free and easy to connect Room is big enough and ceiling to floor windows are just fabulous Breakfast is very nice and a good value if discount is offered
